name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Similar Products Finder by Image for eBay

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find similar products on eBay by searching products with an image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Similar Products Finder is an image search extension, it can help you find similar products on eBay by an image.

Have you ever wondered if there are any similar products before you check out, but have no clue how to find them? Here comes the solution, the Similar Products Finder will do it for you.

After the installing the extension, right click on the image of the product, and select "Find Similar Products", you will get a variety of similar products.

At this moment, it only support eBay, but will support more online stores in the future.

Enjoy your shopping with Similar Products Finder.
